ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Everything they did is in the Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: All things they do are (recorded) in the books;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All their deeds are recorded in the Scrolls;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whatever they have done has been recorded in the Books (records of the deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And all what they did is in the Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And everything they have done is noted in Az-Zubur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And everything they have done is in the writings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Every thing that they have done is in the Scrolls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And every thing they did is in the scriptures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All their deeds are recorded in their books:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And everything they have wrought is in the Writs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Everything they have done is in the books,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: All that they do is noted in (their) Books (of Deeds):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And each and everything they have done is noted in (their) Records (of deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: All their deeds are in the Scrolls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Everything they have done is in the Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And everything they did is in written records.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:52] And everything they, that is, servants, have done is, recorded, in the scrolls, the books of the Guardian Angels (al-hafaza),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And every thing they did) of transgression in their state of idolatry and opposition of the prophets (is in the Scriptures) written down; and it is said this means: it is written in the Guarded Tablet. This also was revealed about those who disputed about fate.
